result.name: easset
result.notes: Database used by the Youth Justice Board  placement service to record custodial orders (e.g. hearing date, Court name, custodial Order type) and placement results.It is used to record sentence calculations and licences/notices of supervisions for young people placed in Secure Children's Home and Secure Training Centres.  Dataset  holds record sentence management information including planning and reviews and objectives. Barnados uses the database to record information on inductions and referrals in relation to Advocacy services.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: eAsset

extras.value: The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: Will be used for the custody chapter of the Youth Justice Statistics from 2013/14 onwards.
